title: Hospital calls fire crew to liberate man's penis - National
body: My nursing tutor loving tells a memory of a patient they treated who was a big bushy truck driver who used a um 'toy', to help with their long journeys. The patient was admitted to the emergency department following a run in with a pothole on the back roads, they had to remove a large black plastic object the size of a cucumber from his rectum.
readable_content:
- voy1d (2023-12-08): Hospital calls fire crew to liberate man's penis - National
- KiwiSi: Made a real cock of himself. ..ahaa. .hahaa.......
- [deleted]: My nursing tutor loving tells a memory of a patient they treated who was a big bushy truck driver who used a um 'toy', to help with their long journeys. The patient was admitted to the emergency department following a run in with a pothole on the back roads, they had to remove a large black plastic object the size of a cucumber from his rectum. Poor lad, bloody legend.
- [deleted]: ♫♫'Cause if you liked it, then you should have put a ring on it, If you liked it, then you shoulda put a ring on it, oh oh oh oh oh oh, oh oh oh oh oh oh oh♫♫
